# itemTime(for:)

**Instance Method**

Converts a Core Video timestamp to the item’s timebase.

## Declaration

```swift
func itemTime(for timestamp: CVTimeStamp) -> CMTime
```

## Parameters

- **timestamp**: A timestamp value provided by the Core Video framework.

## Return Value

The equivalent time in the item’s timebase.

## Time conversion

- **itemTime(forHostTime:)**: Converts a host time, specified in seconds, to the item’s timebase.
- **itemTime(forMachAbsoluteTime:)**: Converts a Mach host time to the item’s timebase.
